name: Conquer The City - Takeover It
description:
A simple and fun placement puzzle mobile game

Lead the green rubber man to guard your own city while occupying cities of other colors
When all the cities are occupied by the green rubber men, you will be victorious!

Swipe your finger to connect the green building with other buildings and capture the city. In the game, you need to formulate the right strategic plan in order to strategize and win the final victory. good luck!
